statements: SELECT * FROM Policies;
SELECT policy_id, customer_name FROM Policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, coverage_limit FROM Policies WHERE premium_amount >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT policy_id, SUM(premium_amount) AS total_premium FROM Policies GROUP BY policy_id HAVING total_premium >= 5000;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE premium_amount > 1000 ORDER BY coverage_limit DESC, policy_id ASC;
SELECT policy_id, customer_name, coverage_limit FROM Policies WHERE premium_amount < 5000;
SELECT customer_name, premium_amount FROM Policies WHERE coverage_limit BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM Policies WHERE coverage_limit > 8000;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' AND premium_amount > 2000;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_limits, premium_amount FROM Policies;
SELECT premium_amount, policy_id, coverage_limits FROM Policies;
SELECT coverage_limits, policy_id, premium_amount FROM Policies;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_id FROM Policies WHERE coverage_limits >= 50000;
SELECT * FROM Policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_id, premium_amount FROM Policies WHERE coverage_limits > 1000;
SELECT policy_id, premium_amount FROM Policies WHERE coverage_limits BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE premium_amount > 500 ORDER BY coverage_limits ASC;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_limits, premium_amount FROM Policies WHERE coverage_limits >= 500 AND premium_amount < 1000;
SELECT * FROM Policies;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_limit FROM Policies WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_limit, premium_amount FROM Policies ORDER BY coverage_limit DESC;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE coverage_limit BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT policy_id, premium_amount FROM Policies WHERE coverage_limit < 5000;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_limit, premium_amount FROM Policies WHERE premium_amount > 1000 ORDER BY coverage_limit DESC;
SELECT policy_id, premium_amount FROM Policies WHERE coverage_limit BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY premium_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE coverage_limit < 50000 AND premium_amount < 2000;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_limit FROM Policies WHERE premium_amount = (SELECT MAX(premium_amount) FROM Policies);
SELECT policy_id, coverage_limit, premium_amount FROM Policies WHERE coverage_limit >= 10000 OR premium_amount <= 500;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_limit FROM Policies WHERE coverage_limit > 1000 ORDER BY coverage_limit DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM Policies WHERE premium_amount < 500 ORDER BY policy_holder_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE coverage_limit BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY premium_amount ASC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_limit, premium_amount FROM Policies WHERE policy_holder_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE policy_holder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_limit FROM Policies WHERE coverage_limit > 1000 ORDER BY coverage_limit DESC;
SELECT SUM(premium_amount) FROM Policies;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_holder_name FROM Policies ORDER BY policy_holder_name ASC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, coverage_limit FROM Policies WHERE coverage_limit BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY policy_holder_name DESC, coverage_limit ASC;
SELECT * FROM Policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, coverage_limit FROM Policies WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT holder_name, holder_address FROM PolicyHolders ORDER BY holder_name DESC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM Agents WHERE agent_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM PolicyClaims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE coverage_limit > 5000 ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT policy_name, premium_amount FROM Policies WHERE premium_amount < 1000 ORDER BY premium_amount ASC;
SELECT holder_name, holder_address FROM PolicyHolders WHERE holder_address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY holder_name;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM Agents WHERE agent_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT policy_id, claim_date FROM PolicyClaims WHERE policy_id = 123 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
